org.mini2Dx.ui.controller

Interface ControllerUiInput<T extends ControllerButton>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MdxControllerListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PS4UiInput, Xbox360UiInput, XboxOneUiInput

    public interface ControllerUiInput<T extends ControllerButton>
extends MdxControllerListener
    Common interface for implementing MdxController based UI input

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disable()
      Disables this controller input for the UiContainer
      void dispose()
      Cleans up and de-registers this instance from the associated UiContainer
      void enable()
      Enables this controller input for the UiContainer
      T getActionButton()
      Returns the button used to trigger Actionable instances
      java.lang.String getId()
      Returns the unique id of this ControllerUiInput
      boolean isEnabled()
      Returns if the controller input is enabled for the UiContainer
      void setActionButton(T actionButton)
      Sets the button used for triggering Actionable instances
      void update(float delta)
      Updates the input for repeating presses

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(float delta)
        Updates the input for repeating presses
        Parameters:
        delta - The time since the last frame (in seconds)

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Returns if the controller input is enabled for the UiContainer
        Returns:
        True if enabled (enabled by default)

        Enables this controller input for the UiContainer
